member.name: M:UserManagementApi.Infrastructure.MigrationWithLockExtensions.MigrateAndSeedWithSqlLockAsync``1(Microsoft.Extensions.Hosting.IHost,System.String,System.String,System.Func{System.IServiceProvider,System.Threading.CancellationToken,System.Threading.Tasks.Task},System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Acquires a SQL app-lock, then runs EF Migrate() and your seed delegate. Use the SAME lock name across ALL services hitting the same SQL Server.
